name: Silent Draw
description:
You are Nero, full time thief for hire. The job of your life has fallen into your lap, a chance to rob the secret vault of the world's largest Casino, Ωgigia. Your contractor, known only as "The Dealer" has provided you with limited resources and information, and the place is packed to the teeth with guards. However, with the help of your wits and some skillful card playing, you may just be able to score big.

Silent Draw is a deckbuilding stealth game where you must build a deck of powerful items and abilities to navigate a labyrinthine Casino full of guards who want you dead. How far will you manage to get?
